body_html:
@peterjc123 I did not change any environement variable concerning cuda or cudnn. It is strange an error like that appears even though the folder is generally found. I also have no other problems with cuda or cudnn. It's just with this build process.

I try your fix when it's in master.

body:
@peterjc123  I did not change any environement variable concerning cuda or cudnn. It is strange an error like that appears even though the folder is generally found. I also have no other problems with cuda or cudnn. It's just with this build process. 

I try your fix when it's in master.
